short_phrase_options: Ex-Government Deputy CEO → AI-First Engineer | 2 live AI agents with paying users in 19 countries | Built 6 production apps solo in 7 months
Solo founder with LIVE products + PAYING USERS | Built 6 AI apps for <$15K (98% cheaper than teams) | Ex-Deputy CEO turned AI engineer
AI Product Builder serving 19-country LATAM market | PayPal subscriptions LIVE | Ex-Deputy CEO, now full-stack AI engineer
Former E-Government CTO who relocated to Panama and rebuilt as AI engineer | 2 live products with revenue | 6 apps, 50K+ lines of code

seeking: AI-first company (seed to Series A) where I can leverage unique combination of executive leadership + rapid technical execution
Role where I can ship production features quickly using AI-assisted development (built 6 apps solo in 7 months)
Multi-AI orchestration, LLM integration, or conversational AI as core to the mission
Early-stage environment where one person's contributions materially change trajectory
Founding engineer or early technical hire where work directly impacts product-market fit
Mission-driven company solving real problems for underserved markets (education, financial inclusion, AI accessibility)
Learning environment to improve: production-scale AI systems, mobile development, ML engineering beyond API integrations
avoiding: Slow-moving bureaucracy with excessive process, long approval chains, quarterly release cycles
Non-technical leadership without understanding of modern AI development
Pure services/consulting work without compounding product value
Roles where AI is just marketing buzzword, not core product
Environments dismissing AI-assisted development tools (Cursor, Claude, GPT-4)
ideal_culture: Ship fast, iterate based on user feedback
Embrace AI tools as productivity multipliers

for_founding_engineer.highlight: Proven ability to build, ship, monetize solo

experience_framing.honest_approach: 7 years as Deputy CEO & CLO (executive/strategic) + 7-8 months intensive hands-on AI development (50K+ lines of production code, 6 apps, 2 with paying users)
experience_framing.value_prop: Rare combination: executive strategy + hands-on execution + modern AI-first development
experience_framing.address_gap: While hands-on coding is recent (8 months), execution quality demonstrates senior-level capability: production systems, paying users, revenue generation

key_differentiators: 2 LIVE AI agents with PAYING USERS (not portfolio projects)
Web3 Native (DAO, tokenomics, Polygon) + AI Engineer (rare combo)
Single mother who relocated and rebuilt from zero (resilience story)

short_coding_experience.objection: Only 7-8 months hands-on coding, not 5+ years
short_coding_experience.response: Built 6 production apps with paying users in 7 months. Quality of execution demonstrates senior-level capability despite shorter timeline. Modern AI-assisted development enables 10× productivity.

solo_work.objection: All solo work, no team experience
solo_work.response: 7 years leading cross-functional teams as Deputy CEO. Now seeking to combine leadership experience with hands-on technical skills in collaborative environment.

location.response: Remote-first advantage: built for 19 countries from Panama. Comfortable with US time zones. Member of Innovation Smart District Panama (strong tech ecosystem).

ideal_companies: Y Combinator startups (seed to Series A)

application_scripts.cold_email_to_founder:
Hi [Founder Name],

I built 2 live AI agents with paying users in 19 countries — not a portfolio project, a real business with PayPal subscriptions. I'm now looking to join an AI startup as founding engineer.

What caught my attention about [Company]: [2-3 specific things].

My background: 7 years as Deputy CEO in E-Government + 7 months building AI products (6 apps, 50K+ lines of code, all solo).

You can try my AI assistant: wa.me/50766623757

I'd love to discuss how I can help [Company] [their goal]. Available this week.

Best,
Elena
application_scripts.linkedin_message: Hi [Name], I'm building AI products (2 live agents with paying users) and looking to join an AI startup as founding engineer. Saw your work at [Company] and impressed by [specific thing]. Would love to connect!
application_scripts.yc_application_summary: I'm an ex-Deputy CEO & CLO who became an AI engineer. Built 6 production apps solo in 7 months (<$15K budget, 98% cost reduction). Now have 2 live AI agents with paying users across 19 countries (PayPal subscriptions active). Seeking founding engineer role at YC startup to bring my unique combo of executive strategy + hands-on AI execution.
